scripts.css:build:default: sass sass/main.scss dist/ww.min.css --style compressed && sass sass/main.scss dist/ww.css
scripts.css:build:no-normalize: sass sass/main-no-normalize.scss dist/ww-no-normalize.min.css --style compressed && sass sass/main-no-normalize.scss dist/ww-no-normalize.css
scripts.build: npm run css:build:default && npm run css:build:no-normalize
